verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> it came to pass <S%G1096><s%>, when <S%G3753><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had made an end of <S%G5055><s%> commanding <S%G1299><s%> his <S%G846><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%>, he departed <S%G3327><s%> there <S%G1564><s%> to teach <S%G1321><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to preach <S%G2784><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> their <S%G846><s%> cities <S%G4172><s%>.

And said <S%G2036><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, are <S%G1488><s%> you <S%G4771><s%> he that should come <S%G2064><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> do we look for <S%G4328><s%> another <S%G2087><s%>?

A reed <S%G2563><s%> shaken <S%G4531><s%> with <S%G5259><s%> the wind <S%G417><s%>?

But <S%G235><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> went you out <S%G1831><s%> for to see <S%G1492><s%>? But <S%G235><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> went you out <S%G1831><s%> for to see <S%G1492><s%>? A prophet <S%G4396><s%>? Yes <S%G3483><s%>, I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> more than <S%G4053><s%> a prophet <S%G4396><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> he <S%G4012><s%>, of whom <S%G3739><s%> it is written <S%G1125><s%>, Behold <S%G2400><s%>, I <S%G1473><s%> send <S%G649><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> messenger <S%G32><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> face <S%G4383><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> shall prepare <S%G2680><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> way <S%G3598><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> you <S%G4675><s%>.

truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, Among <S%G1722><s%> them that are born <S%G1084><s%> of women <S%G1135><s%> there has <S%G1453><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> risen <S%G1453><s%> a greater than <S%G3187><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> the Baptist <S%G910><s%>: nevertheless <S%G1161><s%> he that is least <S%G3398><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> greater than <S%G3187><s%> he <S%G846><s%>.

He that has <S%G2192><s%> ears <S%G3775><s%> to hear <S%G191><s%>, let him hear <S%G191><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> unto what <S%G5101><s%> shall I compare <S%G3666><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> generation <S%G1074><s%>? And <S%G2532><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%>, We have piped <S%G832><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> you have <S%G3738><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> danced <S%G3738><s%>; we have mourned <S%G2354><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> you have <S%G2875><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> lamented <S%G2875><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> neither <S%G3383><s%> eating <S%G2068><s%> nor <S%G3383><s%> drinking <S%G4095><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> they say <S%G3004><s%>, He has <S%G2192><s%> a devil <S%G1140><s%>.

But <S%G2532><s%> wisdom <S%G4678><s%> is justified <S%G1344><s%> of <S%G575><s%> her <S%G846><s%> sons <S%G5043><s%>.

Then <S%G5119><s%> began he <S%G756><s%> to upbraid <S%G3679><s%> the cities <S%G4172><s%> where <S%G3739><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> most <S%G4118><s%> of <S%G1411><s%> his <S%G846><s%> mighty works <S%G1411><s%> were done <S%G1096><s%>, because <S%G3754><s%> they repented <S%G3340><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>:

Even so <S%G3483><s%>, Father <S%G3962><s%>: for <S%G3754><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> it seemed <S%G1096><s%> good <S%G2107><s%> in <S%G1715><s%> your sight <S%G4675><s%>.

All things <S%G3956><s%> are delivered <S%G3860><s%> unto me <S%G3427><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> no man <S%G3762><s%> knows <S%G1921><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%>, but <S%G1487><s%> <S%G99999><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%>; neither <S%G3761><s%> knows <S%G1921><s%> any man <S%G5100><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%>, save <S%G1487><s%> <S%G99999><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> he to whom <S%G3739><s%> soever <S%G1437><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> will <S%G1014><s%> reveal him <S%G601><s%>.
